-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | TDoc is a typed document builder with support for (X)HTML
--   
--   TDoc is a typed document builder with support for (X)HTML
@package tdoc
@version 0.4.6

module Text.TDoc.Core
class IsNode node
class IsAttribute attr
class (IsNode father, IsNode child) => IsChildOf child father
class (IsAttribute attr, IsNode node) => IsAttributeOf attr node
class IsNode a => IsBlockOrInline a
class IsBlockOrInline a => IsInline a
class IsBlockOrInline a => IsBlock a
data AttributeOf t node
TAttr :: (t attr) -> attr -> AttributeOf t node
type AttributesOf t node = [AttributeOf t node]
data TDoc t tag
TNode :: t tag -> AttributesOf t tag -> [ChildOf t tag] -> TDoc t tag
tTag :: TDoc t tag -> t tag
tAttrs :: TDoc t tag -> AttributesOf t tag
tChildren :: TDoc t tag -> [ChildOf t tag]
data ChildOf t father
Child :: (TDoc t child) -> ChildOf t father
class ToChildren a t father
toChildren :: ToChildren a t father => a -> [ChildOf t father]
class ToTDoc a t b
toTDoc :: ToTDoc a t b => a -> TDoc t b
class AddAttrs a t b
(!) :: AddAttrs a t b => a -> AttributesOf t b -> a
class FromTDoc a t tag
fromTDoc :: FromTDoc a t tag => TDoc t tag -> a
type PutM a = Writer [a] ()
type Star t node = forall children. ToChildren children t node => children -> TDoc t node
type Nullary t node = TDoc t node
type Unary t node = forall child. child `IsChildOf` node => TDoc t child -> TDoc t node
type Plus t node = forall children child. (child `IsChildOf` node, ToChildren children t node) => TDoc t child -> children -> TDoc t node
(+++) :: (ToChildren a t tag, ToChildren b t tag) => a -> b -> [ChildOf t tag]

-- | This operator is an infix sugar for <a>put</a> <tt>paragraph &lt;&lt;
--   do ...</tt> is equal to <tt>put $ paragraph $ do ...</tt>.
(<<) :: a `IsChildOf` b => (c -> TDoc t a) -> c -> PutM (ChildOf t b)
put :: ToChildren children t father => children -> PutM (ChildOf t father)
tStar :: t a -> Star t a
tNullary :: t a -> Nullary t a
tUnary :: t a -> Unary t a
tPlus :: t a -> Plus t a
instance (Monad m, FromTDoc w t tag, Monoid w, a ~ ()) => FromTDoc (WriterT w m a) t tag
instance FromTDoc a t tag => FromTDoc (Identity a) t tag
instance FromTDoc a t tag => FromTDoc [a] t tag
instance (t1 ~ t2, IsChildOf b a) => FromTDoc (ChildOf t1 a) t2 b
instance (t1 ~ t2, a ~ b) => FromTDoc (TDoc t1 a) t2 b
instance AddAttrs b t c => AddAttrs (a -> b) t c
instance (t1 ~ t2, a ~ b) => AddAttrs (TDoc t1 a) t2 b
instance (Monad m, ToTDoc (m w) t b, a ~ ()) => ToTDoc (WriterT w m a) t b
instance ToTDoc a t b => ToTDoc (Identity a) t b
instance (t1 ~ t2, a ~ b) => ToTDoc (TDoc t1 a) t2 b
instance (Monad m, ToChildren (m w) t b, a ~ ()) => ToChildren (WriterT w m a) t b
instance ToChildren a t b => ToChildren (Identity a) t b
instance (t1 ~ t2, IsChildOf a b) => ToChildren (TDoc t1 a) t2 b
instance (t1 ~ t2, a ~ b) => ToChildren (ChildOf t1 a) t2 b
instance (ToChildren a t n, ToChildren b t n, ToChildren c t n) => ToChildren (a, b, c) t n
instance (ToChildren a t n, ToChildren b t n) => ToChildren (a, b) t n
instance ToChildren () t b
instance ToChildren a t b => ToChildren [a] t b

module Text.TDoc.TH
node :: String -> NodeOpts -> [Name] -> [Name] -> Q [Dec]
nodeChildren :: Name -> [Name] -> Q [Dec]
nodeAttributes :: Name -> [Name] -> Q [Dec]
attribute :: Name -> Q [Dec]
attributes :: [Name] -> Q [Dec]
tagInstances :: Name -> [Name] -> Q [Dec]
tagInstance :: Name -> Name -> Dec
data NodeOpt
NoTag :: NodeOpt
Inline :: NodeOpt
Block :: NodeOpt
BlockOrInline :: NodeOpt
type NodeOpts = [NodeOpt]
instance Eq NodeOpt

module Text.TDoc.Attributes
data Length
Px :: Int -> Length
Cm :: Int -> Length
Em :: Int -> Length
toPixels :: Length -> Int
newtype Width
Width :: Length -> Width
fromWidth :: Width -> Length
newtype Height
Height :: Length -> Height
fromHeight :: Height -> Length
newtype Src
Src :: String -> Src
fromSrc :: Src -> String
newtype Size
Size :: Int -> Size
fromSize :: Size -> Int
newtype Alt
Alt :: String -> Alt
fromAlt :: Alt -> String
newtype ClassAttr
ClassAttr :: String -> ClassAttr
fromClassAttr :: ClassAttr -> String
newtype Name
Name :: String -> Name
fromName :: Name -> String
newtype Rows
Rows :: Int -> Rows
fromRows :: Rows -> Int
newtype Cols
Cols :: Int -> Cols
fromCols :: Cols -> Int
newtype Style
Style :: String -> Style
fromStyle :: Style -> String
newtype Identifier
Identifier :: String -> Identifier
fromIdentifier :: Identifier -> String
newtype Href
Href :: String -> Href
fromHref :: Href -> String
newtype TitleAttr
TitleAttr :: String -> TitleAttr
fromTitleAttr :: TitleAttr -> String
class WidthTag t
widthTag :: WidthTag t => t Width
class HeightTag t
heightTag :: HeightTag t => t Height
class SrcTag t
srcTag :: SrcTag t => t Src
class SizeTag t
sizeTag :: SizeTag t => t Size
class AltTag t
altTag :: AltTag t => t Alt
class ClassAttrTag t
classAttrTag :: ClassAttrTag t => t ClassAttr
class NameTag t
nameTag :: NameTag t => t Name
class RowsTag t
rowsTag :: RowsTag t => t Rows
class ColsTag t
colsTag :: ColsTag t => t Cols
class StyleTag t
styleTag :: StyleTag t => t Style
class IdentifierTag t
identifierTag :: IdentifierTag t => t Identifier
class HrefTag t
hrefTag :: HrefTag t => t Href
class TitleAttrTag t
titleAttrTag :: TitleAttrTag t => t TitleAttr
width :: (WidthTag t, Width `IsAttributeOf` node) => Length -> AttributeOf t node
height :: (HeightTag t, Height `IsAttributeOf` node) => Length -> AttributeOf t node
src :: (SrcTag t, Src `IsAttributeOf` node) => String -> AttributeOf t node
size :: (SizeTag t, Size `IsAttributeOf` a) => Int -> AttributeOf t a
alt :: (AltTag t, Alt `IsAttributeOf` node) => String -> AttributeOf t node
classAttr :: (ClassAttrTag t, IsNode a) => String -> AttributeOf t a
name :: (NameTag t, Name `IsAttributeOf` a) => String -> AttributeOf t a
rows :: (RowsTag t, Rows `IsAttributeOf` a) => Int -> AttributeOf t a
cols :: (ColsTag t, Cols `IsAttributeOf` a) => Int -> AttributeOf t a
style :: (StyleTag t, Style `IsAttributeOf` a) => String -> AttributeOf t a
identifier :: (IdentifierTag t, Identifier `IsAttributeOf` a) => String -> AttributeOf t a
href :: (HrefTag t, Href `IsAttributeOf` a) => String -> AttributeOf t a
titleAttr :: (TitleAttrTag t, TitleAttr `IsAttributeOf` a) => String -> AttributeOf t a
class (WidthTag t, HeightTag t, SrcTag t, ClassAttrTag t, StyleTag t, SizeTag t, AltTag t, NameTag t, RowsTag t, ColsTag t, IdentifierTag t, HrefTag t, TitleAttrTag t) => AttributeTags t
instance IsNode n => IsAttributeOf Identifier n
instance IsNode n => IsAttributeOf Style n
instance IsNode a => IsAttributeOf ClassAttr a
instance IsAttribute TitleAttr
instance IsAttribute Href
instance IsAttribute Identifier
instance IsAttribute Style
instance IsAttribute Cols
instance IsAttribute Rows
instance IsAttribute Name
instance IsAttribute ClassAttr
instance IsAttribute Alt
instance IsAttribute Size
instance IsAttribute Src
instance IsAttribute Height
instance IsAttribute Width
instance Show Length

module Text.TDoc.Tags
data Leaf
class LeafTag t
leafTag :: LeafTag t => t Leaf
newtype Url
Url :: String -> Url
fromUrl :: Url -> String
class LeafTags t
charTag :: LeafTags t => Char -> t Leaf
stringTag :: LeafTags t => String -> t Leaf
strictByteStringTag :: LeafTags t => ByteString -> t Leaf
lazyByteStringTag :: LeafTags t => ByteString -> t Leaf
char :: LeafTags t => Char -> TDoc t Leaf
string :: LeafTags t => String -> TDoc t Leaf
strictByteString :: LeafTags t => ByteString -> TDoc t Leaf
lazyByteString :: LeafTags t => ByteString -> TDoc t Leaf
data Paragraph
class ParagraphTag t
paragraphTag :: ParagraphTag t => t Paragraph
paragraph :: ParagraphTag t => Star t Paragraph
para :: ParagraphTag t => Star t Paragraph
data Title
class TitleTag t
titleTag :: TitleTag t => t Title
title :: TitleTag t => Star t Title
data Br
class BrTag t
brTag :: BrTag t => t Br
br :: BrTag t => Nullary t Br
data Hr
class HrTag t
hrTag :: HrTag t => t Hr
hr :: HrTag t => Nullary t Hr
data Col
class ColTag t
colTag :: ColTag t => t Col
col :: ColTag t => Star t Col
data HCol
class HColTag t
hColTag :: HColTag t => t HCol
hcol :: HColTag t => Star t HCol
data Row
class RowTag t
rowTag :: RowTag t => t Row
row :: RowTag t => Star t Row
data Table
class TableTag t
tableTag :: TableTag t => t Table
table :: TableTag t => Star t Table
data Item
class ItemTag t
itemTag :: ItemTag t => t Item
item :: ItemTag t => Star t Item
data UList
class UListTag t
uListTag :: UListTag t => t UList
ulist :: UListTag t => Star t UList

-- | <a>ulistQ</a> is a quick version of <a>ulist</a> when all children of
--   a UList are homogeneous one can factor the building of the Item nodes.
ulistQ :: (UListTag t, ItemTag t, a `IsChildOf` Item) => [TDoc t a] -> TDoc t UList
data Span
class ClassAttrTag t => SpanTag t
spanTag :: SpanTag t => t Span
spanDoc :: SpanTag t => Star t Span
spanDocCA :: SpanTag t => String -> Star t Span
strong :: SpanTag t => Star t Span
small :: SpanTag t => Star t Span
big :: SpanTag t => Star t Span
italics :: SpanTag t => Star t Span
sub :: SpanTag t => Star t Span
sup :: SpanTag t => Star t Span
tt :: SpanTag t => Star t Span
bold :: SpanTag t => Star t Span
data Div a
class DivTag t
divTag :: DivTag t => t (Div a)
div :: DivTag t => Star t (Div a)
data Subsection
class SubsectionTag t
subsectionTag :: (SubsectionTag t, a `IsChildOf` Span) => TDoc t a -> t Subsection
subsection :: (SubsectionTag t, a `IsChildOf` Span, ToTDoc b t a) => b -> Star t Subsection
data Section
class SectionTag t
sectionTag :: (SectionTag t, a `IsChildOf` Span) => TDoc t a -> t Section
section :: (SectionTag t, a `IsChildOf` Span, ToTDoc b t a) => b -> Star t Section
data HLink
class HLinkTag t
hLinkTag :: HLinkTag t => Url -> t HLink
hlink :: HLinkTag t => String -> Star t HLink
data Anchor
class AnchorTag t
anchorTag :: AnchorTag t => t Anchor
anchor :: AnchorTag t => Unary t Anchor
data Image
class ImageTag t
imageTag :: ImageTag t => t Image
image :: ImageTag t => Nullary t Image
data Preambule
class PreambuleTag t
preambuleTag :: PreambuleTag t => t Preambule
preambule :: PreambuleTag t => Star t Preambule
data Document
class DocumentTag t
documentTag :: DocumentTag t => t Document
document :: DocumentTag t => Star t Document
data Root
class RootTag t
rootTag :: RootTag t => t Root
root :: (RootTag t, ToTDoc preambule t Preambule, ToTDoc doc t Document) => preambule -> doc -> TDoc t Root
class (AttributeTags t, LeafTags t, ParagraphTag t, TitleTag t, BrTag t, HrTag t, ColTag t, HColTag t, RowTag t, TableTag t, ItemTag t, UListTag t, SpanTag t, DivTag t, SubsectionTag t, SectionTag t, HLinkTag t, AnchorTag t, ImageTag t, PreambuleTag t, DocumentTag t, RootTag t) => Tags t
instance IsChildOf Document Root
instance IsChildOf Preambule Root
instance IsNode Root
instance a ~ Document => IsChildOf (Div a) Document
instance IsChildOf Hr Document
instance IsChildOf Table Document
instance IsChildOf UList Document
instance IsChildOf Paragraph Document
instance IsChildOf Section Document
instance IsNode Document
instance IsChildOf Title Preambule
instance IsNode Preambule
instance IsAttributeOf Width Image
instance IsAttributeOf Height Image
instance IsAttributeOf Src Image
instance IsAttributeOf Alt Image
instance IsBlockOrInline Image
instance IsInline Image
instance IsNode Image
instance IsChildOf Span Anchor
instance IsAttributeOf Href Anchor
instance IsBlockOrInline Anchor
instance IsInline Anchor
instance IsNode Anchor
instance IsInline a => IsChildOf a HLink
instance IsAttributeOf TitleAttr HLink
instance IsBlockOrInline HLink
instance IsInline HLink
instance IsNode HLink
instance a ~ Section => IsChildOf (Div a) Section
instance IsChildOf Subsection Section
instance IsChildOf Hr Section
instance IsChildOf Table Section
instance IsChildOf UList Section
instance IsChildOf Paragraph Section
instance IsNode Section
instance IsBlock a => IsChildOf a Subsection
instance IsNode Subsection
instance IsChildOf b a => IsChildOf b (Div a)
instance IsBlockOrInline a => IsBlockOrInline (Div a)
instance IsBlock a => IsBlock (Div a)
instance IsNode a => IsNode (Div a)
instance IsInline a => IsChildOf a Span
instance IsBlockOrInline Span
instance IsInline Span
instance IsNode Span
instance IsChildOf Item UList
instance IsBlockOrInline UList
instance IsBlock UList
instance IsNode UList
instance IsBlockOrInline a => IsChildOf a Item
instance IsNode Item
instance IsChildOf Row Table
instance IsBlockOrInline Table
instance IsBlock Table
instance IsNode Table
instance IsChildOf HCol Row
instance IsChildOf Col Row
instance IsNode Row
instance IsBlockOrInline a => IsChildOf a HCol
instance IsNode HCol
instance IsBlockOrInline a => IsChildOf a Col
instance IsNode Col
instance IsBlockOrInline Hr
instance IsBlock Hr
instance IsInline Hr
instance IsNode Hr
instance IsBlockOrInline Br
instance IsBlock Br
instance IsInline Br
instance IsNode Br
instance IsChildOf Leaf Title
instance IsNode Title
instance IsInline a => IsChildOf a Paragraph
instance IsBlockOrInline Paragraph
instance IsBlock Paragraph
instance IsNode Paragraph
instance (LeafTags t, a ~ Leaf) => ToTDoc ByteString t a
instance (LeafTags t, a ~ Leaf) => ToTDoc ByteString t a
instance (LeafTags t, b ~ Char, a ~ Leaf) => ToTDoc [b] t a
instance (LeafTags t, a ~ Leaf) => ToTDoc Char t a
instance (LeafTags t, IsChildOf Leaf a) => ToChildren ByteString t a
instance (LeafTags t, IsChildOf Leaf a) => ToChildren ByteString t a
instance (LeafTags t, IsChildOf Leaf a) => ToChildren Char t a
instance IsBlockOrInline Leaf
instance IsInline Leaf
instance IsNode Leaf

module Text.TDoc.Tags.Form
newtype Action
Action :: String -> Action
fromAction :: Action -> String
data Selected
Selected :: Selected
newtype Value
Value :: String -> Value
fromValue :: Value -> String
data Multiple
Multiple :: Multiple
data FormMethod
GET :: FormMethod
POST :: FormMethod
RawFormMethod :: String -> FormMethod
data InputType
TEXT :: InputType
PASSWORD :: InputType
CHECKBOX :: InputType
RADIO :: InputType
SUBMIT :: InputType
RESET :: InputType
FILE :: InputType
IMAGE :: InputType
BUTTON :: InputType
HIDDEN :: InputType
class FormMethodTag t
formMethodTag :: FormMethodTag t => t FormMethod
class ActionTag t
actionTag :: ActionTag t => t Action
class SelectedTag t
selectedTag :: SelectedTag t => t Selected
class ValueTag t
valueTag :: ValueTag t => t Value
class MultipleTag t
multipleTag :: MultipleTag t => t Multiple
class InputTypeTag t
inputTypeTag :: InputTypeTag t => t InputType
formMethod :: (FormMethodTag t, IsAttributeOf FormMethod a) => FormMethod -> AttributeOf t a
action :: (ActionTag t, IsAttributeOf Action a) => String -> AttributeOf t a
selected :: (SelectedTag t, IsAttributeOf Selected a) => AttributeOf t a
selectedB :: (SelectedTag t, IsAttributeOf Selected a) => Bool -> AttributesOf t a -> AttributesOf t a
selectedMS :: (SelectedTag t, IsAttributeOf Selected a) => Maybe Selected -> AttributesOf t a -> AttributesOf t a
value :: (ValueTag t, IsAttributeOf Value a) => String -> AttributeOf t a
inputType :: (InputTypeTag t, IsAttributeOf InputType a) => InputType -> AttributeOf t a
data Label
class LabelTag t
labelTag :: LabelTag t => t Label
label :: LabelTag t => Star t Label
data Input
class InputTag t
inputTag :: InputTag t => t Input
input :: InputTag t => Nullary t Input
data Option
class OptionTag t
optionTag :: OptionTag t => t Option
option :: OptionTag t => Star t Option
data Select
class SelectTag t
selectTag :: SelectTag t => t Select
select :: SelectTag t => Star t Select
data Textarea
class TextareaTag t
textareaTag :: TextareaTag t => t Textarea
textarea :: (TextareaTag t, AttributeTags t) => Rows -> Cols -> Star t Textarea
data Form
class FormTag t
formTag :: FormTag t => t Form
form :: FormTags t => Star t Form
class (ActionTag t, ValueTag t, FormMethodTag t, SelectedTag t, InputTypeTag t, MultipleTag t) => FormAttributeTags t
class (FormAttributeTags t, LabelTag t, InputTag t, OptionTag t, FormTag t, SelectTag t, TextareaTag t) => FormTags t
selectQ :: (LeafTags t, FormTags t) => AttributesOf t Select -> (String, String) -> [(String, String)] -> TDoc t Select
instance Form ~ a => IsChildOf (Div a) Form
instance IsChildOf Form Document
instance IsChildOf Label Form
instance IsChildOf Input Form
instance IsChildOf Textarea Form
instance IsChildOf Select Form
instance IsAttributeOf FormMethod Form
instance IsAttributeOf Action Form
instance IsBlockOrInline Form
instance IsBlock Form
instance IsNode Form
instance IsChildOf Leaf Textarea
instance IsAttributeOf Name Textarea
instance IsAttributeOf Cols Textarea
instance IsAttributeOf Rows Textarea
instance IsNode Textarea
instance IsChildOf Option Select
instance IsAttributeOf Size Select
instance IsAttributeOf Name Select
instance IsAttributeOf Multiple Select
instance IsNode Select
instance IsChildOf Leaf Option
instance IsAttributeOf Value Option
instance IsAttributeOf Selected Option
instance IsNode Option
instance IsAttributeOf InputType Input
instance IsAttributeOf Value Input
instance IsAttributeOf Name Input
instance IsNode Input
instance IsInline a => IsChildOf a Label
instance IsNode Label
instance IsAttribute InputType
instance IsAttribute Multiple
instance IsAttribute Value
instance IsAttribute Selected
instance IsAttribute Action
instance IsAttribute FormMethod
instance Eq InputType
instance Ord InputType
instance Enum InputType
instance Show InputType
instance Show FormMethod

module Text.TDoc.XHtml
type HtmlAttributeOf = AttributeOf HtmlTag
type HtmlAttributesOf x = AttributesOf HtmlTag x
type HtmlDoc = TDoc HtmlTag
data HtmlTag t
RootTag :: HtmlTag Root
PreambuleTag :: HtmlTag Preambule
DocumentTag :: HtmlTag Document
SectionTag :: HtmlDoc a -> HtmlTag Section
SubsectionTag :: HtmlDoc a -> HtmlTag Subsection
UListTag :: HtmlTag UList
ItemTag :: HtmlTag Item
ParagraphTag :: HtmlTag Paragraph
SpanTag :: HtmlTag Span
AnchorTag :: HtmlTag Anchor
HLinkTag :: Url -> HtmlTag HLink
TitleTag :: HtmlTag Title
ImageTag :: HtmlTag Image
BrTag :: HtmlTag Br
HrTag :: HtmlTag Hr
RawHtmlTag :: Html -> HtmlTag a
TableTag :: HtmlTag Table
RowTag :: HtmlTag Row
ColTag :: HtmlTag Col
HColTag :: HtmlTag HCol
DivTag :: HtmlTag (Div a)
FormTag :: HtmlTag Form
InputTag :: HtmlTag Input
OptionTag :: HtmlTag Option
SelectTag :: HtmlTag Select
TextareaTag :: HtmlTag Textarea
LabelTag :: HtmlTag Label
StyleTag :: HtmlTag Style
IdentifierTag :: HtmlTag Identifier
HrefTag :: HtmlTag Href
AltTag :: HtmlTag Alt
SrcTag :: HtmlTag Src
WidthTag :: HtmlTag Width
HeightTag :: HtmlTag Height
ClassAttrTag :: HtmlTag ClassAttr
InputTypeTag :: HtmlTag InputType
NameTag :: HtmlTag Name
ValueTag :: HtmlTag Value
FormMethodTag :: HtmlTag FormMethod
ActionTag :: HtmlTag Action
SelectedTag :: HtmlTag Selected
MultipleTag :: HtmlTag Multiple
SizeTag :: HtmlTag Size
RowsTag :: HtmlTag Rows
ColsTag :: HtmlTag Cols
TitleAttrTag :: HtmlTag TitleAttr
rawHtml :: Html -> HtmlDoc a
rawHtml_ :: a -> Html -> HtmlDoc a
lookupClassAttr :: IsAttributeOf ClassAttr nodeTag => HtmlAttributesOf nodeTag -> Maybe (String, HtmlAttributesOf nodeTag)
renderTDocHtml :: IsNode nodeTag => HtmlDoc nodeTag -> Html
ex :: IO ()
instance t ~ HtmlTag => HTML (ChildOf t fatherTag)
instance (t ~ HtmlTag, IsNode a) => HTML (TDoc t a)
instance Tags HtmlTag
instance AttributeTags HtmlTag
instance FormTags HtmlTag
instance FormAttributeTags HtmlTag
instance TitleAttrTag HtmlTag
instance HrefTag HtmlTag
instance IdentifierTag HtmlTag
instance HLinkTag HtmlTag
instance DivTag HtmlTag
instance SubsectionTag HtmlTag
instance SectionTag HtmlTag
instance HColTag HtmlTag
instance ColTag HtmlTag
instance RowTag HtmlTag
instance TableTag HtmlTag
instance HrTag HtmlTag
instance BrTag HtmlTag
instance ImageTag HtmlTag
instance TitleTag HtmlTag
instance ParagraphTag HtmlTag
instance ItemTag HtmlTag
instance UListTag HtmlTag
instance DocumentTag HtmlTag
instance PreambuleTag HtmlTag
instance RootTag HtmlTag
instance AnchorTag HtmlTag
instance SpanTag HtmlTag
instance ColsTag HtmlTag
instance RowsTag HtmlTag
instance SizeTag HtmlTag
instance NameTag HtmlTag
instance AltTag HtmlTag
instance ClassAttrTag HtmlTag
instance WidthTag HtmlTag
instance HeightTag HtmlTag
instance SrcTag HtmlTag
instance StyleTag HtmlTag
instance LabelTag HtmlTag
instance TextareaTag HtmlTag
instance SelectTag HtmlTag
instance OptionTag HtmlTag
instance InputTag HtmlTag
instance FormTag HtmlTag
instance MultipleTag HtmlTag
instance InputTypeTag HtmlTag
instance SelectedTag HtmlTag
instance FormMethodTag HtmlTag
instance ActionTag HtmlTag
instance ValueTag HtmlTag
instance LeafTags HtmlTag

module Text.TDoc

module Text.TDoc.QQ
frQQ :: QuasiQuoter
frTop :: SpanTag t => Star t Span
frAntiq :: ToChildren a t father => a -> [ChildOf t father]
